query:
SELECT g.id, g.userId, u.name, u.email, COUNT(gl.lojaId) as num_lojas 
FROM gestores g 
LEFT JOIN users u ON g.userId = u.id 
LEFT JOIN gestor_lojas gl ON g.id = gl.gestorId 
WHERE u.email LIKE '%marco%' OR u.name LIKE '%Marco%'
GROUP BY g.id, g.userId, u.name, u.email;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2rEtBRZHWZUfGJS.3b07a01772f8 --database 3c9MozLH35e233uWy5WDtH --execute SELECT g.id, g.userId, u.name, u.email, COUNT(gl.lojaId) as num_lojas 
FROM gestores g 
LEFT JOIN users u ON g.userId = u.id 
LEFT JOIN gestor_lojas gl ON g.id = gl.gestorId 
WHERE u.email LIKE '%marco%' OR u.name LIKE '%Marco%'
GROUP BY g.id, g.userId, u.name, u.email;
